publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2471.1 Tommy Sheridan: Debt Relief—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2471) in the name of Murdo Fraser, leave out from "have voiced a commitment" to end and insert "are committed to the promotion of free markets, privatisation, anti-trade union practices and protection of multi-national corporations who plunder and rape resources in pursuit of maximum profits with wanton disregard to individual nation’s natural mineral wealth and other resources, and believes that the IMF and the World Bank represent the rich and powerful across the world, present a real obstacle to tackling world poverty and should be completely restructured or disbanded."
